Header.title: IQ Test Coin
Header.paragraph: The first IQ Test runing on Ethereum blockchain.

About.paragraph: IQCoin was born to help children with special needs. Both in the upper and lower end. If a child does not receive the education that he needs, he cant develop properly. Most schools are ment to be for childs between 80 and 120 IQ. We plan to develop a community that is aware of this problematic and we will have a dao to vote for proposals that make a better future for special childrens. The test is an untimed IQ Test that is stored on ethereum blockchain, you have all the time you need to answer the questions. This is a hard test and require a considerable amount of effort to be solved
Why: Once you submit you will receive them automatically

Services.name: Total Supply
Services.text: There are a total of 100b IQCoins., Be the first to have them

Services.name: Help Childrens
Services.text: 20% of the tokens will be used to help childrens with special education needs.

Services.name: Uniswap
Services.text: 50% of the tokens will go to uniswap liquidity pool. Join our telegram and twitter communities to be informed about the Launching date

Services.name: Testers and Helpers!
Services.text: 20% of the tokens will be avaiable to earn taking the test.

Services.name: Dev and Marketing
Services.text: 10% of the tokens will be for further Dev and Marketing.

Services.name: DAO
Services.text: We plan to build a DAO in the future, so every coin will have a vote.

Features.title: Earn IQC
Features.text: Take the test and earn IQCoins according to your score.

Features.title: Help childrens
Features.text: 20% of the funds will go to help childrens with educational needs.

Features.title: UniSwap
Features.text: Once there is enough liquidity it will get listed on UniSwap, be the first to have it.
